definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Moviemakers are using drones to film from the sky.
sentences.chinese: 電影製片人使用無人機在天空裏拍電影。

sentences.english: They knew my work as a religious producer in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道我在拉丁美洲地區是一名宗教製片人。

sentences.english: He's getting barraged with new scripts every month from filmmakers across Asia.
sentences.chinese: 他每月都會接二連三地接到來自亞洲製片人的新劇本。

sentences.english: During the initial hubbub of publicity, a producer contacted me.
sentences.chinese: 在最初宣傳中，一位製片人和我聯繫。

sentences.english: The "Snow Flower" producers hope they can change the trend.
sentences.chinese: 《雪花祕扇》的製片人希望他們能改變這個趨勢。

sentences.english: I took this picture with the owners and executive producers for Shanghai Film Group and Television Production Company.
sentences.chinese: 這張是我和上影集團老闆和製片人的合影。

sentences.english: Walt Disney, the great film-maker, was born in 1901.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾特迪斯尼，偉大的電影製片人，生於1901年。
卡蒂佛是我們的製片人。

sentences.english: Thus, film producers would not have to pay much money for the famous actors and actresses.
sentences.chinese: 因此，電影製片人不會有著名演員支付多少錢。

sentences.english: Will you come to my new station and be the producer?
sentences.chinese: 你願意到我的新電視臺來做製片人嗎？

sentences.english: Chad:No. he is a famous moviemaking.
sentences.chinese: 不，他是一個著名的製片人。

sentences.english: The producers refused to even talk about residuals.
sentences.chinese: 製片人們甚至拒絕提到剩餘工資。

sentences.english: I would like to succeed as a producer.
sentences.chinese: 我想成爲一名成功的製片人。

sentences.english: Jack doubles as director and producer.
sentences.chinese: 傑克兼當導演和製片人。

sentences.english: And Roger is the videographer and the producer of the history videos.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑是一位攝影師，也是歷史影片製片人。

sentences.english: Connery was called to the producers' London office for an interview.
sentences.chinese: 康納利被招到製片人的倫敦辦事處去接受面試。

definition: to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
to supervise the manufacture of/to supervise the shooting of films/executive producer (film)
